McMd::McPairExternalPerturbation< PairInteraction, ExternalInteraction > Class Template Reference
Free Energy Perturbation

Detailed Description

template<class PairInteraction, class ExternalInteraction>
class McMd::McPairExternalPerturbation< PairInteraction, ExternalInteraction >

A Perturbation in the pair interaction epsilon(0,1) for any pair potential supporting setEpsilon() and in the external parameter for any external potential supporting setExternalParameter().

An McPairExternalPerturbation describes a Hamiltonian with a variable pair interaction between species 0 and 1 and with a variable external parameter. The perturbation parameter consists of the pair interaction parameter epsilon(0, 1) and the external parameter.

Definition at line 49 of file McPairExternalPerturbation.h.

virtual double derivative (int i) const
 Return (0-1 pair energy) / ( kT *epsilon(0,1) ) if i is 0 or (external potential energy)/ ( kT *externalParameter ) if i is 1.
